Body: When I owned a iPhone, all the software seemed to be very polished(Visually). For example, the process to getting to menu's shorter etc. I own an s4 and the apps and the software does not seem to be as polished as iOS?Both platforms are being developed by very intelligent programmers and creative people, so why is it that Android is not as polished?
Title: Why are Android Apps not as polished as iOS?

history.Text: When I owned a iPhone, all the software seemed to be very polished(Visually)... the process to getting to menu's shorter etc... My question is now that I own an s4... the apps and the software does not seem to be as polished as IOS?Both platforms are being developed by very intelligent programmers and creative people... so why is it that Android is not as polished?
Why are Android Apps not as polished as IOS?
